entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
